_header: On the ground there is an hill
_description: George Ripley, alchemical verse on the Ripley scrolls — eighteen couplets

BodAshRol40.First Lines:
On þe ground there is a hillallsoo A serpent in a
                    well…
BodAshRol40.Last Lines:
…Of þe [ ] þe redhere truly is þe very
                    dede
BodAshRol40.Note: Penultimate line written over and partly illegible.

CamFitz276.First Lines:
On the gronde ther is an helleAll so a sarpene wythyn a
                    welleIs talle is long wyth wynges wyedeAll redy to flee be euerry
                    syde…
CamFitz276.Last Lines:
…Of the wythe stone and the redeLo here is the verry troue
                    deede

EDCPRS.First Lines:
One the grownde there is an hillallsoe a serpente within a
                    well…
EDCPRS.Last Lines:
…of þe white stone & the redheare is trewly the very
                    ded
EDCPRS.Note:
Eighteen couplets in two columns of 9 x 2 each, second verse on
                    roll.
